property.name: text
property.value: This model consists of two TDL modules, the incDecModule and the sumModule. The incDecModule consists of two tasks, an increment task and a decrement task. There are two modes in the incDecModule. In the regular mode, both, inc and dec run with the same speed. In the fast mode, the dec task runs double as fast which is achieved by setting the frequency of the dec task inside this mode to two thus decreasing its LET. The sum module produces the sum of the signals from the inc and the dec task.
